title: Enhancing Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Transformative Learning Assessment Design for Nursing MOOCs

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners achieve at least three stages (e.g., problem recognition, inquiry, forming new perspectives) of the seven-stage transformative learning process
Learners demonstrate critical reflective abilities regarding ethical dilemmas in nursing practice during online discussions and assignments

At the end of a four-week mid-term course, learners will submit four self-reflective journals (one per week) and achieve 4/5+ in each of three rubric items (structural clarity, depth of reflection, concreteness of action plans) to systematically organize learning experiences.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
